knimeNode.name: IDF
knimeNode.shortDescription: Computes the inverse document frequency (idf) of each term according to the given set of documents and adds a column containing the idf value.

fullDescription.intro:
Computes the inverse document frequency (idf) of each term according to the given set of documents and adds a column containing the idf value. The value for term ti is computed as follows: idf(ti) = log(1 + (f(D) / f(d, ti)),
where f(D) is the number of all documents and f(d, ti) is the number of documents containing term ti.
fullDescription.option: Specifies the document column to use for frequency couting.

dataIn.name: Terms and related documents input table

ports.dataIn: The input table which contains terms and documents.
ports.dataOut: The output table which contains terms documents and a corresponding frequency value.
